posts.post_title: WTB: Any T-206s with Hindu Backs
posts.post_content:
Posted By: JP
Thanks to everyone who responded to this posting.  I've made 4 deals already off of this one post, and reunited with some old friends (yes, you Scott Levy [IMG]https://www.net54baseball.com/images/wink.gif[/IMG] ).  It is nice to be back in the Net54 mix.  Please feel free to contact me at anyime with any Brown Hindu T-206s you might have. 

All the best,
JP
